body_html:
This is a duplicate of #6620. That said, #6620 is a pretty serious issue. zheng-xq can probably say more about whether we can add static shape information to the parameter objects that cudnn-rnn builds.
…

body:
This is a duplicate of #6620.  That said, #6620 is a pretty serious issue.
 zheng-xq can probably say more about whether we can add static shape
information to the parameter objects that cudnn-rnn builds.

On Mon, Apr 24, 2017 at 3:29 PM, Geoffrey Irving <notifications@github.com>
